product_name: Yellow Mirror Embroidered Cotton Kurta Set
description: Perfect for any summer event, this 3-piece bright yellow kurta set embraces the season’s mood in all its simplicity. Featuring elegant embroidery and mirror work along the neckline, this set is crafted using 100% cotton and ready to become your favourite.

A simple yet elegant kurta set featuring India-inspired prints. Crafted in soft & breathable viscose, this kurta comes with side panels to give more flare along with embroidery on the neckline and sleeves. Paired with straight pants, making it a perfect set suitable for festive events, casual gatherings, and day events.
Brighten up your summer style more with this kurta. Featuring bold Ikat inspired print and puff sleeves, this kurta has been crafted using 100% viscose and makes for a playful summer look.

product_name: Festive Green Geometric Printed Viscose Jumpsuit
description: Make a style statement at any occasion with this jumpsuit. Crafted using 100% viscose, this jumpsuit features geometric print with playful shoulder tassel details and an embroidered belt for a festive look.

Embrace the essence of timeless elegance with this solid kurta. This kurta is crafted from soft, breathable, and eco-friendly viscose fabric for ultimate comfort. The fit-and-flare kurta is elevated with delicate threadwork along the neckline and sleeves, making it great for daytime. Pair it with matching bottoms & brown sandals to look chic.

Step into style with this beautiful 2-piece outfit, crafted from breathable viscose fabric and featuring an eye-catching India-inspired print. The elegant long cape features intricately embroidered sleeves and a trendy tie-up front, perfectly complementing the maxi dress.

Whether it's a girls' day out or one of self-love, this top is the perfect partner for all your plans. Crafted in 100% Viscose, this top has delicate embroidery, ethnic motifs, and some fun tie-up details for a perfectly casual look.

product_name: Pink Viscose Maxi Dress With Long Cape
description: This elegant 2-piece set features an Ikat and Chevron inspired print on a viscose fabric base. The set includes a long cape with a tie-up front and embroidered sleeves, paired with a strappy long maxi. Ideal for formal events, festive celebrations, and cultural gatherings.

Featuring India-inspired embroidery, this elegant top is perfect for your daytime or weekend looks. Featuring three-quarter bell sleeves and gathers on the front, this top is crafted in soft & breathable cotton, offering a relaxed fit. It can be paired with shorts and boots for an offbeat look.

Featuring a graphic style print, this breezy layered summer dress is all you need for the months ahead. Adjustable straps and a flowy silhouette, this dress is crafted with 100% cotton that will keep you cool even in the hottest months.

The set includes a spaghetti crop top with delicate mirror work embroidery on the neckline, paired with flared palazzo pants. Perfect for casual outings, day events, and summer gatherings, this outfit offers a fun and stylish look.

product_name: BHAANAVI HANDWOVEN BENARASI SILK SAREE - BLACK
description: An exquisite drape, Bhaanavi is inspired by the gleam of celebrations and is handwoven by the master artisans of Benaras. The Benarasi brocade is a centuries-old craftform and the epitome of heirloom crafts, learned over years of practice. product_name: KASANO AJRAKH HAND-BLOCK PRINTED SILK SAREE - MUSTARD
description: Inspired by the blooming flowers spotted in a spring garden, our Kasano saree features hand-block printed Ajrakh. Created using intricate hand-block prints & eco-friendly dyes, it is an ancient craft passed down from generations.
